synopsis:
Summer is coming to an end. A little girl on the beach remembers the days spent giggling and dancing with her friend. The goodbyes and memories intertwine in a mesh of sorrow and joy.

Graduate Work 2019, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

title.en: That summer there were two of us
title.jp: Ano Natsu ni Futari de Ita
